title: Disability
content:
i'm tired of hiding my disability i was born with one, the flamewars in the past such as the attacks on bush, howard, enimem & on the board staff over the matrix movies, etc were all the result of my disability, i'm not using mine as an execuse

anyway do you have a disability, i know a few people here do
simply vote yes or no

title: Re: Disability
content:
I have self diagnosed myself with clinical depression, does that count?~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Re: Disability
content:
It depends on what you mean by disability. Physical? Mental? Of what severity? What if you don't consider it a disability? And whats yours?

I have several; our family is plauged by them. Mostly its my dyslexia, but I also have less than perfect eyesight. Elder brother is ADD, younger Autistic. Me, I'm just plain nuts.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

title: Re: Disability
content: Yeah, it depends a lot. I have most probably something, I'd guess.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Disability
content:
thank you for being so understanding over this issue

anyway i have a few if i can spell them properly

depression & asperger's sydrome

i'm not going to deny that i have tried a few times that i have tried to kill myself cos i'm worried that i will end up in a CRU (community residential unit) where all my rights will be removed including the ability to control my own money

I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Re: Disability
content: Australia

title: Re: Disability
content:
So let me get this straight, even though all your disability is an excuse flamewars its not an excuse?

My younger brother has considered suicide several times, thats scary. I don't think I could ever kill myself, but then again I'm not depressed.

And interestingly a while back a mental patient sued the government here for letting him out when he was still mentally unstable, causing him to injure several people.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

title: Re: Disability
content: Which one is the disability? To accept failure or not?[hr]The human brain is not user-friendly...

title: Re: Disability
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Which one is the disability? To accept failure or not?[hr][/quote]

To not accept failure results in depression.

Would being addicted to the PC count?

No, really; I have viral induced Athsma, and am experiencing the downsides of it now; I AM FEELING HORRIFIC!!!

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sick.gif[/img]

Unlike normal athsma, I have the chills, and the signs of an upper-respitory flu, but it isn't affected by flu medications, and my inhailer doesn't work as well as it should. I rarely get this, but when I do, it's serious. I'm just sooo lucky we have exams tomorrow (We have 3 trimesters, and also have exams at the end of each one, we are compleating Term I): We are off for a week, and I can shake this.

Suicide; almost suceeded, but then I thought of myself dead ([img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img] ), and it scared me; never tried again. Depression is depressing, but you just need to realize that we all have good days, and bad days...

I feel sick... and don't want to think now... so, bye.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sick.gif[/img] Proud Leader of the "Tough Guys Wear Pink" Society

title: Re: Disability
content:
I accept failure. The problem is I don't accept non-failure. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]


"Depression is depressing, but you just need to realize that we all have good days, and bad days..."
Oh really? Glad you've realized it now.
Seriously, yeah, there's always the bad days too. It'd be stupid to suicide just because some day sucks. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Disability
content:
As odd as it sounds; not only do I fear faliure, but I have a deep seated fear of excessive success.

I accept faliure; if you've already failed all you can do is note your mistaikes and try again. Success is accepted too, but just not too much.

Depression, hmm. We may have good days and bad days, but some people really just can't 'snap out of it'

Suicide I once heard described as the torment of existence overwhelming the horror of nonbeing. Whenever I think of it that way all thoughts of it are expelled from my mind.


A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Disability
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]
"Depression is depressing, but you just need to realize that we all have good days, and bad days..."
Oh really? Glad you've realized it now.
Seriously, yeah, there's always the bad days too. It'd be stupid to suicide just because some day sucks.
[hr][/quote]

Yes, but it is a chemical imbalance in the brain. One that causes even the best days to become a living hell. You can only see the one thing that goes wrong, and you can only focus on it until it consumes your mind. Hence the joys of living become dread.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Re: Disability
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Seriously, yeah, there's always the bad days too. It'd be stupid to suicide just because some day sucks.[hr][/quote]

Yup...

[quote]Quote:[hr]Yes, but it is a chemical imbalance in the brain. One that causes even the best days to become a living hell. You can only see the one thing that goes wrong, and you can only focus on it until it consumes your mind. Hence the joys of living become dread. [hr][/quote]

My friend, Tim, is like that, but I know him well enough to get him out of those moods.

He'll be sooo depressed (Tim is a tough guy, and doesn't mind if I mess with him [If I get depressed, the poor man gets womped over the head with my science book, and I have to admit, it feels darn good!!!]), and so I'll come over to him, and shake him like he was a lifeless doll... I'll do it till he's ticked at me, and then he strangles me. He smiles then, and thus, is not depressed... I could end depression for all of you if I died I guess...
